response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a carefully considered price of $1,200,000. This represents an outstanding investment and a significant saving compared to its true market value. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both of us. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
